issue.title: www.guiadasemana.com.br

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.guiadasemana.com.br/restaurantes/galeria/onde-comer-burrata-em-sao-paulo-restaurantes](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.guiadasemana.com.br%2Frestaurantes%2Fgaleria%2Fonde-comer-burrata-em-sao-paulo-restaurantes) ### Comment > * Top leftover: `guiadasemana.com.br#$##site-main{ margin-top: 0 !important; }` > * Leftover in the middle of the article: `guiadasemana.com.br##.placement:has(#teadsPlace)` > > Sharing blocks: `guiadasemana.com.br###top-share, #page-share` > > Migraine-inducing annoyance that keeps showing and hiding the floating menu when you scroll up and down: > > `guiadasemana.com.br##+js(addEventListener-defuser, scroll)` > > `guiadasemana.com.br#$##main-header{position: absolute !important; top: 20px! important}` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/o9zznj7nalckwwgg4cc848ss8ck8oo8f8eifz9eyxk.png?nc=1)
